sentences.sentence: I do not arrogate to myself the right to decide.
Don't arrogate wrong intentions to your colleagues.
sentences.translation: 不要硬说你同事们动机不良。

sentences.sentence: At the same time, due to resource arrogate English in Asia, the only emu oil exporters.
sentences.translation: 同时，由于资源独揽，英吉利是亚洲唯一的鸸鹋油出口商。
